business_definition: Program Communication Block (PCB) for PASFL database access, containing database control information and status fields
Database descriptor name identifying the PASFL database being accessed
Segment level indicator showing the hierarchical level of the current segment in the database
PCB status code indicating the result of the last database operation
Processing options defining the allowed operations (Get, Insert, Replace, Delete) for this PCB
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
Name of the database segment currently being processed
Key feedback name length indicator (USAGE COMP)
Number of sensitive segments defined for this PCB (USAGE COMP)
Key feedback area containing the concatenated key of the current segment position in the database
